title: Whooshs, Swooshs & Swishs - Sound Effects
description: More than 250 High Quality Sound Effects for your game! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


Update One - 16/11/2023

(5 new SFX Added)


Variety

When you buy this pack you automatically get more than 250 high quality files related to Whooshs, Swishs, Swooshs, and several other sound effects to use in your game, I'm sure this pack will be useful to you in some way.


More than one layer

It has 44 folders that you can see in the video and in the documentation, and inside these folders you get the complete sound effect and its layers, so for example, the "Whoosh_Door" folder will have the sound of the Door, and the Whoosh , both together and separate, so you can at another time use the Door sound for another occasion, and the Whoosh sound for another event. And even create your own sound effects.


Don't stick to the name

It's important to remember that I named the files after the visual reference when I created them, but you can easily use a sound to another stuff, like some small magics, or monster movements, cars passing by, movements in general.


Another possibilities

I believe this pack can also be used for so many different actions, it all depends on the animation, let the imagination flow :D due to the fact that you receive multiple files.


Helping each other

And by investing in this package you take all that, and it helps me to continue creating quality sound effects for the community! :)


Check the preview

Check the documentation

The Monster Slayer - Sound Effect Bundle in Sound Effects - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 274

Number of Audio Cues: 274

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
